channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Disney announces major OpenAI deal, includes $1B equity investment, use of characters on Sora video platform
item.description: Disney licensed 200 iconic characters from Marvel, Pixar and Star Wars to OpenAI for its Sora video program in a groundbreaking three-year partnership...

item.title: Fed delivers third straight rate cut but 'dot plot' projects just one cut in 2026
item.description: Federal Reserve policymakers cut interest rates by 25 basis points for the third straight meeting, though their "dot plot" projections suggest only on...

item.title: AI Search Is Revealing Hidden Risks — Identity Security Must Evolve
item.description: AI search is uncovering unexpected identity gaps, forcing companies to reevaluate access controls and close risky permissions before they can be explo...

item.title: Android Users Issued 24-Hour Warning—Attacks Have Started
item.description: This attack has a nasty surprise for its victims — ransomware suddenly hits Android.

item.title: AI Agents Are Poised To Take Over Software Buying, But Are We Ready?
item.description: AI agents are starting to size up software specifications and purchases for us.

item.title: RFK Jr. and Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy had a pull-up competition at Reagan to announce Trump’s $1 billion plan for healthy airport upgrades
item.description: Officials were vague about what these upgrades could include.

item.title: ‘Creativity is the new productivity’: Bob Iger on why Disney chose to be ‘aggressive,’ adding OpenAI as a $1 billion partner
item.description: "We'd rather participate in the rather dramatic growth, rather than just watching it happen and essentially being disrupted by it," Iger told CNBC.

item.title: OpenAI aims to silence concerns it is falling behind in the AI race with release of new model GPT-5.2
item.description: OpenAI said its new model outperforms those from rivals Google and Anthropic across a wide range of evaluations.

item.title: OpenAI and Disney just ended the ‘war’ between AI and Hollywood with their $1 billion Sora deal—and OpenAI made itself ‘indispensable,’ expert says
item.description: “Google has YouTube. OpenAI now has the Magic Kingdom,” copyright expert Matthew Sag said.

item.title: Bob Iger says Disney’s $1 billion deal with OpenAI is an ‘opportunity, not a threat’: ‘We’d rather participate than be disrupted by it’
item.description: The three-year deal will bring more than 200 Disney characters to Sora.

item.title: NASA Finds Evidence Of Atmosphere On Alien World 280 Light-Years Away
item.description: Data from the James Webb Space Telescope suggests that exoplanet TOI-561 b is surrounded by a thick atmosphere above a global magma ocean.

item.title: Rivian Is Adding Self-Driving Capability To Its EVs, Starting With The R2 SUV
item.description: Beginning in late 2026, the company will add an array of hardware and software enhancements to its midsize model for autonomous driving. Next up: Robo...

item.title: Dow, S&P 500 eye records in final hour, as tech slump drags Nasdaq lower — live
‘Nothing affordable in the Affordable Care Act’ as healthcare costs set to rise
Dow and S&P 500 score record closing highs, while AI jitters drag Nasdaq lower
Eight stock picks to play one of the healthiest corners of the market
Blue-chip Dow rallies into record territory while Oracle’s skid weighs on Nasdaq
Small businesses report record monthly surge in price increases as inflation pressure mounts
item.description: Small businesses hit a record high for price increases in November, with 34% raising prices amid persistent inflation pressures, an NFIB survey reveal...

item.title: GoFundMe increasingly being used to fundraise for basic economic needs like food, housing
item.description: Essential expense fundraising surged 20% on GoFundMe as "monthly bills" became the second-fastest growing fundraising category behind "charity" campai...

item.title: Fed cuts interest rates for third straight time amid uncertainty over labor market, inflation
item.description: The Federal Reserve announced its third straight interest rate cut following its December meeting amid concerns about slowing labor market despite inf...

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
